titleStmt.title: Solitude improved by divine meditation, or, A treatise proving the duty and demonstrating the necessity, excellency, usefulness, natures, kinds and requisites of divine meditation first intended for a person of honour, and now published for general use by Nathanael Ranew.
titleStmt.author: Ranew, Nathanael, 1602?-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.M. for Nathanael Ranew and Jonathon Robinson ...,
